description: The Hjellestad crew neck sweater is a sporty and practical piece, made in the softest mix of Merino wool and cotton. The quality feels luxurious and soft, but combined with the sporty design, it is such a versatile garment that will make you look chic and elegant for the harbor lunch as well. Wear it as a midlayer, or straight on your skin, paired with the Lista shorts.
name: We Norwegians Hjellestad Crew Neck - Mens
